General.Name: Shinsung Tngsn
General.Description: Shinsung Tongsang Co., Ltd. manufactures, distributes, and sells fashion products in Korea. It also exports fibers and clothes of various brands, including OLZEN, ZIOZIA, AND Z, TOPTEN10, TOPTEN KIDS, and EDITION. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
